ModMetaData.name: Roof Support A15
ModMetaData.author: Nommy, Updated by Match
ModMetaData.description:
Updated from Alpha 10 to Alpha 14. This mod will allow you to build massive rooms without collapsing the ceiling.These supports do not impede movement, nor provide cover.
Special thanks to Nommy, Igabod, Minus, Shinzy, Vas.
